title: T206 Doyle N.Y. w Sov 350 Back for Trade
author: T206Collector

posts.post_title: T206 Doyle N.Y. w Sov 350 Back for Trade
posts.post_content:
If anyone is interested, I have a Doyle with Sovereign 350 back that I would be willing to trade for another Doyle with a common back. The card is not in that great condition, but it is presentable.  
In return, I would either ask for an upgrade on the Doyle I have in terms of condition or the same condition Doyle but with common back plus addition of some T206 cards that I don't have (I don't have close to 300).

Email me at [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url] if you're interested in such a trade.

[URL="http://picasaweb.google.com/lh/photo/cdD-UXWHBPGCTmiXGDPB1w?feat=embedwebsite"][IMG]http://lh5.ggpht.com/_Ys7fw31kTDs/TCvs3eiAc1I/AAAAAAAAH70/rcDCZBAgzjA/s800/JoeDoyle_Sov350.JPG[/IMG][/URL]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=21170&d=1278027194[/IMG][IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=21171&d=1278027203[/IMG]

let me know if this would work

That's a nice card, however the creasing on the face and apparent paper loss on the back makes it somewhat less desirable to me.  If it was packaged with some other cards, I might consider it.  But not straight up.  Thanks anyway!
